name: inconspicuous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not easily or quickly noticed or seen, or not attracting attention: This type of bird is very inconspicuous because of its dull feathers. At parties, he always stands in a corner and tries to look inconspicuous. Opposite
conspicuous

not easily noticed or seen; not attracting attention: Agents placed the camera on a wall in an inconspicuous place.
